name: 線上課程設計
goals: 促使學生深入理解知識整合與相關教學理論，並獲得設計線上課程與評量之能力。
syllabus:
Please be aware that this course is offered in English. 

Topics included in this course:

*   Learning theories for online education
*   Design frameworks and principles for online course design
*   Trends and findings of research on online learning
*   Overview and critique of online learning systems: current state and potential
*   Innovative technology for online courses
*   Online course design projects for various subject areas and educational levels
*   Evaluation of online learning

methodologies.note: Instructor will provide introduction of online learning theories and design frameworks.
Students will be guided during class for whole class and small group discussions.
Students will be guided to analyze current issues and problems in online learning and discuss possible solutions.
Students will work in groups for course assignments and discussions.
Students will engage in projects designing online courses.
Students will be guided to incorporate multimedia and innovative technology in their online course design.

grading.note: Course assignments before, during or after class
Active participation in class discussion is required.
Mid-term report: critique of an online course design
Final project: An online course design
